snippet.title: EVERSPACE 2 | Expansion Teaser
snippet.description:
Our end of year gift to the community is a little peek at what we've been working on! Space pilots return to Aethon, one of the star systems coming in an all-new EVERSPACE 2 expansion launching in 2025. Stay tuned for the full announcement, expansion title, and more info in the new year!

Follow us on: 
https://www.facebook.com/everspace.game
https://bsky.app/profile/everspace.game
https://twitter.com/everspace_game 
https://www.instagram.com/everspace_game/
https://www.reddit.com/r/EverspaceGame/ 
http://discord.gg/rockfishgames

Music used in and officially licensed for the trailer through positionmusic.com: "Ironbreath" by Simone Vallecorsa, co-published by Kings & Creatures
